long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Infinity Pegasus is an extension that will replace the ING Pegasus website of EPITA by a new frontend, with better UI and UX.

No need to download a PDF file anymore to see your grades, nor to spam click the login button. Infinity Pegasus will replace the ugly, buggy and unpractical Pegasus frontend with a new redesigned one.

Project is still at an early stage, but already usable and pretty useful !
